CustomField.description: Is the entity owned in whole or in part by one or more private Equity / venture capital (PE/VC) Group(s)?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is the entity owned in whole or in part by one or more private Equity / venture capital (PE/VC) Group(s)?
CustomField.label: Owned In Whole Or In Part By (PE/VC)

value.fullName: Yes, the entity is owned by a PE/VC group
value.label: Yes, the entity is owned by a PE/VC group

value.fullName: No, the entity is not owned by a PE/VC group
value.label: No, the entity is not owned by a PE/VC group
